statements: SELECT * FROM ECG_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_id, ecg_reading FROM ECG_Data WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT * FROM ECG_Data WHERE abnormality_detected = TRUE
SELECT MAX(ecg_reading) FROM ECG_Data
SELECT AVG(ecg_reading) FROM ECG_Data
SELECT * FROM ECG_Data WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT ecg_reading, abnormality_detected FROM ECG_Data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-02-01'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Readings FROM ECG_Data WHERE abnormality_detected = TRUE GROUP BY patient_id
SELECT AVG(ecg_reading) AS Avg_Reading FROM ECG_Data WHERE timestamp > '2022-03-01'
SELECT patient_id, MAX(ecg_reading) AS Max_Reading FROM ECG_Data WHERE abnormality_detected = FALSE GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY Max_Reading DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM ecg_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT patient_id, ecg_reading FROM ecg_data WHERE ecg_reading > 2.5
SELECT * FROM patient_info WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT name, age FROM patient_info ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT ecg_reading, timestamp FROM ecg_data ORDER BY ecg_reading DESC
SELECT * FROM ecg_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, ecg_reading FROM ecg_data WHERE ecg_reading > 3.0;
SELECT * FROM ecg_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patient_info WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT patient_id, name, gender FROM patient_info WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM ECG_Data;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM ECG_Data ORDER BY ecg_timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, ecg_timestamp, heart_rate FROM ECG_Data WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT * FROM Patient_Info WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM Patient_Info WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM ECG_Data;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM ECG_Data WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM ECG_Data GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT Patient_Info.patient_name, Abnormalities.abnormality_type FROM Patient_Info JOIN Abnormalities ON Patient_Info.patient_id = Abnormalities.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM ECG_Data WHERE ecg_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ecg_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT ecg_data FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT record_id, ecg_reading, timestamp FROM ecg_records ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date FROM trends WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM patients LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY age DESC

SELECT patients.patient_id, patients.patient_name, ecg_records.timestamp, abnormalities.abnormality_type FROM patients JOIN ecg_records ON patients.patient_id = ecg_records.patient_id JOIN abnormalities ON ecg_records.record_id = abnormalities.record_id WHERE abnormalities.severity > 5 ORDER BY ecg_records.timestamp DESC

SELECT ecg_records.record_id, ecg_records.timestamp, ecg_records.ecg_reading, abnormalities.abnormality_type, abnormalities.severity FROM ecg_records LEFT JOIN abnormalities ON ecg_records.record_id = abnormalities.record_id WHERE ecg_records.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT trends.trend_id, trends.trend_name, trends.start_date, trends.end_date, patients.patient_name FROM trends JOIN patients ON trends.patient_id = patients.patient_id ORDER BY trends.end_date ASC
SELECT * FROM ecg_data WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patient_info
SELECT patient_id, abnormality_type, severity FROM abnormality_detection WHERE severity > 5
SELECT heart_rate, timestamp FROM heart_rate ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT patient_id, trend_type, trend_value FROM trend_analysis
SELECT * FROM ecg_data WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patient_info WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, timestamp, abnormality_type FROM abnormality_detection WHERE severity >= 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT patient_id, TIMESTAMP, heart_rate FROM heart_rate WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT patient_id, timestamp, trend_type, trend_value FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_value < 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
